channel.title: Allstar drops
channel.description:
ehh since allstars comming back i decided id give on a shot, remade it to fit mopar and cleaned it up, but thats not the point. Im having trouble with its drops, heres my code
npcdrop = 87 5 3734 1
that has a rat drop a vase very simple, Yet it still doesnt drop them any help? :confused: im using npcdrops which im pretty sure is the right file correct me if im wrong.
